channel.title: Usage on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Usage on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: Features
item.description: Tags In DefectDojo, tags are a first class citizen and are recognized as the facilitators of organization within each level of the data model.

item.title: Questionnaires
item.description: Questionnaires Questionnaires provide a means for collecting information from developers and respective stakeholders. DefectDojo includes functionality to create new questionnaires with custom questions, open questionnaires to receive responses for certain time periods from insiders or outsiders, and connect questionnaires with new or existing engagements.
